name: Major Malleable
description: The Major Malleable is a sprawling, shapeless, fleshy creature that embodies chaos and fluidity, capable of altering its form while being largely amorphous.
memorable: It can absorb the health of smaller malleables and can split into smaller creatures, creating tactical challenges in combat.
goals: Typically seeks to overwhelm opponents in combat and absorb their life force.
relations: Often encountered alongside other malleable creatures, enabling it to join forces or create more malleables.
environment: Found in chaotic or twisted environments that resonate with its nature.
strengths: Immunity to psychic damage, the ability to absorb health from others, and high mobility through climbing.
weaknesses: Relatively poor Dexterity leading to a bad modifier and no particular strengths in social interactions.
attacks: Uses powerful tendril attacks that can grapple opponents and drain psychic energy from those grappled.
most_powerful_ability: Psychic Drain, which can significantly reduce opponents' health and potentially convert them into lesser malleables.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 90 feet, enabling it to detect nearby creatures without needing sight.
additional_information: Can absorb others to regenerate health.
Able to split into multiple smaller creatures when damaged.
Each attack can grapple foes, imposing a tough escape DC.
Can join with other Major Malleables to become more powerful.
Has the ability to change shape but cannot take on the stats of other creatures.
test_queries: chaotic amorphous creature with psychic abilities
huge shapeshifting monster that drains life
creature that absorbs health and splits
fluid entity that grapples and drains opponents
powerful malleable monster in chaotic environments
